ðŸ“– Summary: The ascii-movie repository provides a Go-based implementation of an SSH and Telnet server that streams the original Star Wars movie in ASCII format. It features an interactive terminal user interface and can be easily deployed using Docker. Inspired by asciimation and blinkenlights, this project offers a nostalgic command-line entertainment experience.
